game_description: Cactus Cowboy had been kidnapped and imprisoned in a strange underground lab and fights his way up to the surface with his mighty Portal Revolvers.
review_2: It’s fun and aggravating at the same time
review_3: I love this cactus but I found through a portal glitch that I have no body pls give me a prickly cactus body Also good cactus game . Where is cactus cowboy ww2 game????!??!!??!
review_4: The creativity is there but it’s low quality and very challenging.
review_5: I love the game portal and portal 2. I know all of the lore. So i was hoping for this game to at least have portals with depth, but it's literally just render textures. But since you can't get portal natively on the quest, i might as well play this.
